hero.title: Moving is life
hero.subtitle: Every movement you make nourishes both your body and your mind. By activating your muscles, you stimulate your brain, strengthen your mental health, and push away stress and fatigue. Movement is not just an action: it's a natural elixir against the challenges of daily life. Together, let's give your body and mind the vitality they deserve.

philosophy.title: Jean-Charles, aka JC
philosophy.description1: With 15 years of experience as a Personal Trainer in Paris, New York, the Caribbean, and now Geneva, I have mastered the art of optimizing posture and strengthening deep muscles. My expertise is based on proven methods and a personalized approach to bring out the best in you, combining strength, balance, and well-being.
philosophy.description2: Pilates and Functional Training enhance my expertise to provide comprehensive and tailored support. These complementary disciplines help develop strength, flexibility, and balance while respecting each individual's specific needs.

services.title: A unique, precise, and effective method
services.description: My approach relies on close collaboration with my clients to restore mobility, alleviate pain, and prevent future injuries. Together, let’s rebuild your strength, improve your posture, and develop your confidence in a sustainable and secure way.

timing.title: Optimize your strength
timing.description: A tailored program to strengthen your muscles and improve your daily posture.

cycle.title: Plan your goals
cycle.description: Structured sessions and a customized progression to achieve your results with peace of mind.

tension.title: Balance body and mind
tension.description: Combine physical and mental well-being with a holistic and personalized approach.

testimonials.title: Our clients speak better than us

clients.name: Richard Strul
clients.text: I came to JC Trainer 13 years ago with a bad back, a leg partially paralyzed by sciatica, and the doctors’ verdict: no more sports. Within a few months, I was back to playing badminton, volleyball, and off-piste skiing.

clients.name: Marie Dupont
clients.text: JC Trainer completely changed my life. Thanks to him, I regained the shape and motivation I had lost for years.

clients.name: Paul Durand
clients.text: Personalized coaching and incredible attentiveness. Jean-Christophe really knows how to motivate and adapt exercises to each individual.
